p: Amount of HDL-c in the tissues and serum was determined following the method of Grove (1979). Reaction mixture containing 200 μL each of tissue homogenates, serum, and the cholesterol standard was mixed with 500 μL of the diluted precipitant R1 (0.55 mM phosphotungstic acid, 25 mM magnesium chloride) and left for 10 min at 25 °C. The reaction mixture was then centrifuged for 10 min at 4000 rpm.
